mentions.context: We used R packages 'randomForest' to create RF model and 'randomForestExplainer' (Liaw & Wiener, 2002) to design multi-way plot shown in Figure 3.
M5 was built by R package 'RWeka' (Hornik et al., 2009).
Filter methods were computed through R 'mlr' package (Bischl et al., 2016).
We used R packages 'randomForest' to create RF model and 'randomForestExplainer' (Liaw & Wiener, 2002) to design multi-way plot shown in Figure 3.
